txt.en: You have encountered the Warband leader, Shum and his pack of hunters!
Shum is training some of Gajat's adolescent Warg pups how to hunt in a pack. They stalk the smoking ruins that were the farms of The Fallows.
Shum is training some of Gajat's adolescent Warg pups how to hunt in a pack. They stalk the smoking ruins that were the farms of The Fallows.
Shum is training some of Gajat's adolescent Warg pups how to hunt in a pack. They stalk the smoking ruins that were the farms of The Fallows.
The Fallows farmland is safer now that Shum has been taken care of, thanks to you. The people of Forlaw appreciate your efforts.
